metadata.title: USN-6449-1 -- FFmpeg vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that FFmpeg incorrectly managed memory resulting  in a memory leak. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service via application crash. This issue only  affected Ubuntu 18.04 LTS and Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. (CVE-2020-22038)  It was discovered that FFmpeg incorrectly handled certain input files,  leading to an integer overflow. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service via application crash. This issue only  affected Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. (CVE-2020-20898, CVE-2021-38090,  CVE-2021-38091, CVE-2021-38092, CVE-2021-38093, CVE-2021-38094)  It was discovered that FFmpeg incorrectly managed memory, resulting in a memory leak.  If a user or automated system were tricked into  processing a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or execute  arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-48434)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6449-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libavformat-extra - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libswscale5 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavcodec-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavutil-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libswscale-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libswresample-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libswresample3 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavdevice-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavformat58 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavdevice58 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavfilter-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libpostproc55 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libpostproc-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavformat-dev - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavutil56 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavfilter7 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 ffmpeg - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 ffmpeg-doc - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 libavcodec58 - 7:4.4.2-0ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
